products.name: Enfamil Poly-Vi-Sol Multivitamin Supplement Drops with Iron

extendedInfo.detail: Enfamil‰ã¢ Liquid Multivitamin Supplement Drops Poly-Vi-Solå¨ With Iron.  #1 Vitamin drops brand recommended by pediatricians.  New easy-to-use dropper!  For babies transitioning to solid foods.  No artificial colors or flavors.  Helps support a developing immune system*.  1 2/3 fl oz (50 ml). Enfamilå¨ Poly-Vi-Solå¨ with iron Liquid Multivitamin Supplement has the amount of vitamin D recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics for infants and toddlers who consume less than one quart of milk or formula per day.  Poly-Vi-Sol with iron is designed to help meet the nutritional needs of your growing infant or toddler.  Poly-Vi-Sol with iron is an ideal multivitamin supplement during your child's transition to solid foods, during growth spurts, or for the picky eater.  One daily dose of Poly-Vi-Sol with iron has 8 vitamins and iron and is fruit flavored.  This product comes with a child-resistant cap.  While taking liquid multivitamin supplements with iron, a slight darkening of the teeth may occur. Brushing will minimize this temporary condition.  Trust Enfamilå¨ - #1 Selling infant vitamin brand.  *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.  If you have a Question, we are here for you. Call us toll free: 1-800-BABY123, 8 am to 4:30 pm Monday-Saturday, Central Time. Or Visit: www.enfamil.com.  å©2017 Mead Johnson & Company, LLC.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Glycerin, Water, Ascorbic Acid, Ferrous Sulfate, Vitamin E Succinate, Polysorbate 80 (Emulsifier), Niacinamide, Natural Flavor, Riboflavin-5-Phosphate, Thiamin Hydrochloride, Vitamin A Palmitate, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B6 Hydrochloride, Sulfuric Acid (Antioxidant For Iron), Sulfites.
extendedInfo.directions: How to use the enclosed dropper:  Shake the bottle well. Fill the dropper to the 1 ml line to provide the full daily dosage. Use full dosage unless your child's doctor recommends a different dosage. Dispense slowly into your child's mouth toward the inner cheek. It is normal for a small amount to remain in the tip.  Dosing Tips:  Poly-Vi-Solå¨ with iron may be given by dispensing directly into the mouth. It may also be mixed with formula, fruit juice, cereal or other foods to increase your child's acceptance.  Ask your child's doctor about Poly-Vi-Sol with iron.  Refrigeration not required. Store away from direct sunlight.
extendedInfo.warnings: Accidental overdose of iron-containing products is a leading cause of fatal poisoning in children under 6. Keep this product out of the reach of children. In case of accidental overdose, call a doctor or Poison Control Center immediately.  Do not use if printed bottle neckband is missing or broken.
